html:
7.27.24  2:28 am   what's the opposite of sweet? I was thinking salty at first but bitter could also be the opposite of sweet... very sad conundrum

      the opposite of sweet is non-sweet. special thanks to Latin for this

7.27.24  1:14 am   Which shape would you make the sixth olympic ring

      i don't understand what the purpose of a sixth olympic ring would be, but in any case i think it should be ring shaped (for the folks following along at home that would be a circle)

7.27.24  12:38 am   Will you found the ideology/economic system called rentism where instead of owning things people rent them

      i'm sure that system already exists but it's not called rentism. but what i can try to do for you, is rename it to rentism

7.26.24  11:26 pm   hot take on nectarines?

      they're ok

7.26.24  11:08 pm   it seems like you get a lot of questions about a lot of different things. what topic do you get asked about most?

      the problem with topic tallying is that the dividing lines between the topics are not clear. for example, this question, it's not clear if the topic is "things", "questions", "topics", "superlatives", anyway the answer is "things", that's what i get the most questions about

7.26.24  10:50 pm   what is the fundamental ingredient of a pizza.

     the box

      from whence does pizzaness proceed

     the moment when you put it in the box

7.26.24  9:09 pm   who inspired you to make music?

      it was not a person, it has always been music itself that inspires me to make music

7.26.24  8:14 pm   what is your favorite soup

      i don't know any soups

7.26.24  8:00 pm   can you reinvent time and the universe (asking for a friend)

      i'll do it when i get a chance

7.26.24  7:06 pm   What is a word people don't use enough?

      this may be an unpopular opinion, but i think people use all words the correct amount

7.26.24  6:53 pm   Thoughts on other peoples' thoughts on things?

      could be anything, that's what's exciting

7.26.24  6:28 pm   thoughts on Labour?

      i'm glad you used a capital L, otherwise i might have thought you said iabour

7.26.24  4:52 pm   how many peppers did peter piper pick

      none. he ordered them on the internet

7.26.24  4:11 pm   Are we able to meet you? Have you ever thought about forming a band that performs live music? Your music is so real and I want to be as close to it as I can, all the time. Your songs matter. I hope you have a lovely day today

      to carry that a step further, hopefully you can have a lovely day tomorrow

7.26.24  4:00 pm   Do you often imagine being someone else?

      not often, but occasionally yes

7.26.24  3:41 pm   Will you run for president

      yes, i will be the main candidate in both major parties and i am currently polling above 100% in all of the major swing states. i was gonna run in a third party as well, but i didn't wanna risk taking votes away from myself

7.26.24  1:47 pm   Why is there a Communist Manifesto but no Capitalist Manifesto?

      because not all things have the same things

7.26.24  12:58 pm   have you made your favorite video yet?

      no

7.26.24  11:21 am   Is the dress blue and black or white and gold?

      recently confirmed is the existence of a second dress

7.26.24  10:07 am   what is a dog?

      sort of like a drunk cat

7.26.24  7:44 am   are ducks lazy?

      yes but they are not as lazy as the water

7.26.24  4:47 am   i just feel so nervous all the time and its become hard to leave the house, how do I shake that off?

      it may be possible to built a tunnel which leads from your house directly into another house

7.26.24  4:43 am   since you don't have a watch would you say you're friends with your clock?

      i have developed a fairly comfortable relationship with whatever clock we've all been using for the past few decades

7.26.24  2:58 am   do you have an interest in antique coins or collectible memorabilia of that ilk

      yes that's one of my favorite ilks

7.26.24  2:14 am   are you new videos coming?

      don't worry there's great videos and i am making them

7.26.24  1:54 am   thoughts on thoughts?

      no, on thoughts i have feelings. and, in turn, on feelings i have thoughts

7.26.24  1:29 am   do you ever feel bad when someone asks for advice on this page but you're unable to answer?

      yes

7.25.24  11:38 pm   How to tell if you ever rep a set?

      if you find yourself saying the word 'ego', in any context, more than once a week, it's likely that you rep a set now and again

7.25.24  11:06 pm   when the new album dropping?

      i don't drop albums. at the very least, i'd carry it

7.25.24  9:49 pm   is it possible for music to contain no sound?

      it might be visual notation for what the sound is supposed to do. so in that sense, that could still be considered music

7.25.24  8:19 pm   what do you think about numbers?

     so real

      which is your favorite? least favorite?

     as far as i can tell, numbers work a little differently from that

7.25.24  7:42 pm   how do i find the energy for all the things i want to do?

      you find the energy from wanting to do the things. it's that simple

7.25.24  7:25 pm   im crazy but like very crazy

      ok, that's normal,

7.25.24  7:05 pm   Do you like fish

      no but that doesn't mean they are not good

7.25.24  5:53 pm   hoi bill, klopt het dat jij nederlands kan? dat is zeer cool van jou.

      klopt als een bus, which for those of you following along in english means 'true as a bus'

7.25.24  5:31 pm   thoughts on classical music?

      it's surprisingly new

7.25.24  5:24 pm   Bill i'm going shopping, do you want anything?

      no, in this scenario, you are the one who wants something

7.25.24  4:45 pm   what minute of the day is the best, from your personal experience?

      00:00

7.25.24  4:33 pm   did you make your bed today?

      i have one of the pre-made ones

7.25.24  3:33 pm   thoughts on labour?

      it's surprisingly easy

7.25.24  3:25 pm   thoughts on fiber optic technology?

      "good enough"

7.25.24  3:12 pm   have you walked a cat recently? (if so, did the cat walk you back)

      no, i've never done any of those things

7.25.24  1:54 pm   is soap a good way to achieve enlightenment

      occasionally

7.25.24  12:41 pm   what's the names of those little 3d guys that you use in your most recent animations

     person(s)

     also which video are you most proud of

     some of the ones i'm working on now

7.25.24  12:26 pm   Say something controversial?

      books are for looks

7.25.24  10:05 am   Serious question from a professional pianist. How to get better at staying in time and developing an internal metronome? I'm pretty deficient in this regard and it has caused troubles in a band setting.

      ultimately you're going to have to learn to trust yourself. to really posess solid time requires a deep sense of the world around you while also remaining fully honest about the deepest parts of yourself. where the deepest depths of yourself meets the vastest wider world, that's where time can be found

7.25.24  10:01 am   when does the fun begin?

      right away

7.25.24  7:30 am   which alphabet letter is best alphabetletter?

      using different letters together. that's the only thing that does it for me anymore

7.25.24  6:10 am   is bill wurtz the entity that answers the questions on this page?

      yes, but even more specifically, it's a person and it's also me

7.25.24  3:42 am   Can you grow a Mario mustache?

      no
